articles.title: Greetings to Colombian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Colombian President
 Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, on July 16 sent a message of greetings to Alvaro Uribe Velez, President of Colombia, on the occasion of its national day.
					 Kim in the message sincerely wished the president and people of Colombia success in the work for the stability and the socio-economic progress of the country.

articles.title: Various Areas of DPRK Hit by Torrential Rain
articles.content:
Various Areas of DPRK Hit by Torrential Rain
 Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- The low atmospheric pressure which traveled to the East Sea of Korea via the northern parts of the West Sea of Korea brought heavy rains to various areas of the DPRK.
					 The rainfall in Pyongyang, Yodok area of South Hamgyong Province, Maengsan, Sinyang, Phyongsong, Songchon and Tokchon areas of South Phyongan Province was respectively 234mm, 287mm, 231mm, 202mm, 195mm, 191mm and 187mm in the hours from 12:00 on July 17 to 15:00 on July 18.
					
					 Pyongyang, Phyongsong, Sunchon and Maengsan areas of South Phyongan Province and Yodok area of South Hamgyong Province had downpours with precipitation of over 50-130mm from 00:00 to 03:00, from 03:00 to 06:00, from 06:00 to 09:00 and from 09:00 to 12:00 on the 18th.
					
					 Pyongyang was hit by a torrential rain of 64-175mm between 12:00 and 15:00 on Saturday in particular.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Three Charters for Reunification
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Three Charters for Reunification
 Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- The historic June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and the October 4 declaration serve as the banner of victory for the cause of independent reunification as they are an overall embodiment of the three charters for national reunification.
					 Rodong Sinmun Sunday stresses this in a signed article.
					
					 The three charters for national reunification consist of the three principles of independence, peaceful reunification and great national unity, the 10-point programme for the great unity of the entire nation and the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo. They are the reunification programme that is consistent with the spirit of national independence regarding the sovereignty and dignity of the nation as life and soul and carries the warm love for the country and the nation, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 It is stipulated in the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration that the problem of national reunification should be solved independently by the concerted efforts of the Koreans responsible for it. This basic spirit of the June 15 joint declaration was reaffirmed in the October 4 declaration.
					
					 The facts go to prove that the inter-Korean declarations reflect in an overall way the idea of national independence contained in the three charters for national reunification and, accordingly, they are the continuity of the three charters.
					
					 The idea of "By our nation itself" clarified in the said declarations is based on the idea of great national unity laid down in the three charters. And it carries the will to unite all the compatriots loving the country and the nation through reconciliation and unity between the north and the south and thus reunify the country and make a new history of prosperity for the nation.
					
					 The federation formula is the most realistic way for realizing Korea's reunification now that differing ideologies and systems exist in the north and the south for more than half a century and both sides refuse to abandon their own.
					
					 Through the June 15 joint declaration, the north and the south recognized that the north-proposed low-stage federal system and the south-proposed federation system have something in common with each other and affirmed to the entire nation that the reunification would be realized in this way.
					
					 It is quite possible to achieve the independent reunification, peace and prosperity if the inter-Korean declarations, which carry the blueprint of the independent and peaceful reunification clarified by the three charters, are sincerely implemented.

articles.title: Crackdown on Students Censured in S. Korea
articles.content:
Crackdown on Students Censured in S. Korea
Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- The South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification issued a statement on July 15, protesting against the puppet authorities' crackdown upon students.
					The statement referred to the fact that the students including members of the south Korean Federation of University Students in the 21st Century called a press conference in demand of a solution to the issue of the university registration fee on the same day.
					
					Instead of accepting the demand, the authorities walked off Ri Won Gi, chairman of the federation, and committed such fascist outrage as firing volleys of tear gas on the protesting students, it charged.
					
					The statement urged the authorities to immediately stop all sorts of repression of the youth and students in the just struggle and set free at once Ri Won Gi who has worked for solution to the registration fee issue.

articles.title: Centenary of Birth of Kim Il Sung to Be Observed in Nepal
articles.content:
Centenary of Birth of Kim Il Sung to Be Observed in Nepal
Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- A Nepalese national preparatory committee was inaugurated with due ceremony on July 10 to commemorate the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung.
					C. P. Mainali, general secretary of the C.C., Nepal Communist Party (Marxist-Leninist), was elected chairman of the preparatory committee at the ceremony.
					
					The preparatory committee decided to conduct political and cultural events, including remembrance meeting, seminar on the exploits of the President, book exhibition and film show, and widely introduce through media the glorious revolutionary history and immortal exploits of the President and General Secretary Kim Jong Il and the Korean people's efforts for building a great prosperous and powerful nation in the period from July 10, 2009 to April 15, 2012.
					
					 An appeal to the world progressive people was adopted at the ceremony. It stressed that it is duty of the progressive people and organizations in the world striving for independence of humankind to commemorate with splendor the centenary of birth of Kim Il Sung who made immortal contribution to the cause of global independence.
					
					 It called upon the prominent personages and progressive organizations in the world, the organizations for the study of the Juche idea and the Songun politics and the organizations for friendship and solidarity with the Korean people in particular, to intensify their activities and jointly commemorate the centenary of birth of Kim Il Sung, the great sun of revolution.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Feats Lauded in Various Countries
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Feats Lauded in Various Countries
Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- Austrian and Nigerian organizations issued bulletins on July 8 on the occasion of the 15th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					The Group of Youth for the Study of Kim Jong Il Juche Idea in Vienna, Austria, carried in its bulletin a picture of Kim Il Sung with beaming smile in his face and an article praising his feats.
					
					The bulletin elaborated on the fact that after embarking on the road of revolution in his early years, the President organized and led the anti-Japanese armed struggle to liberate Korea from the colonial rule by the Japanese imperialists, realized the cause of building the party, the army and the state and led the Fatherland Liberation War to victory.
					
					It noted that he built the socialist system centered on the popular masses in the DPRK on the basis of the immortal Juche idea.
					
					He has been highly praised as a prominent statesman by the international community for his undying feats for the world revolution, it noted.
					
					The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea carried in its bulletin an article titled "People's Leader".
					
					In this article the bulletin noted that the Korean people have held Kim Il Sung in high esteem as the eternal President of the DPRK. He is always alive in the hearts of the Korean people and this would be unthinkable without the great feats performed by him for the people all his life and his noble traits, it stressed.
					
					 It referred in detail to the fact that he, born as the son of the people, had done everything possible for the people, shared weal and woe with them without making any difference and enjoyed absolute trust and support from them.
					
					 Meanwhile, the Mexican Institute for the Study of the Juche Idea and the Mexican Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism released their bulletins to mark the 56th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Work at C.C., WPK Celebrated by World People
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Work at C.C., WPK Celebrated by World People
Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- The world progressive people significantly celebrated the 45th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					The general secretary of the National Guidance Council of the Vanguard Party of Indonesia, the chairman of the C.C., the Socialist Party of Bangladesh, the general secretary of the C.C., the People's Socialist Party of Mexico, the president of the Group of Dialectical Materialists of Italy, the chairman of the Bulgarian Communists Union, the director-general of the European Society for the Study of the Juche Idea and the director for Political Affairs and International Relations of the Pan-African Movement made public congratulatory statements on the occasion of the anniversary.
					
					A celebration preparatory committee was formed in Switzerland and a Pyongyang cultural exchange center in Colombia.
					
					Celebrations, including meeting, seminar, lecture and round-table talks, were briskly held in different countries and regions.
					
					Exhibitions of Korean books, photos and handicraft showing the immortal exploits performed by
						Kim Jong Il in building up the Party and providing the Songun leadership and the Korean people's efforts to build a great prosperous and powerful nation successfully took place in Laos, Guinea, Nigeria, Brazil, Peru, Mexico, Bulgaria and at the Secretariat of the Pan-African Movement.
					
					Kim Jong Il's celebrated works were brought out in booklet by various publishing houses of Russia, Cambodia and Indonesia, the Joseph Gebauer Publishing House in Vienna, Austria, and the Unified Communist Party of Italy. Among them are works "The Workers' Party of Korea Is a Juche-Type Revolutionary Party Which Inherited the Glorious Tradition of the DIU", "On Preserving the Juche Character and National Character of the Revolution and Construction" and "Giving Priority to Ideological Work Is Essential for Accomplishing Socialism".
					
					 Meanwhile, articles introducing the immortal history of Kim Jong Il's guidance over the Party were posted on Internet and carried in bulletins by the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, the Egypt-Korea Friendship Association, the Mexican Institute for the Study of the Juche Idea, the U.S. Group for the Study of Songun Politics, the Peruvian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism, the Sweden-Korea Friendship Association and the Group of Youth for the Study of Kim Jong Il Juche Idea in Vienna, Austria.
